verbs.description: [V: Speaking] [ARG2: to 2018 graduates] [ARGM-LOC: at the University of Maryland] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] , it was n’t until 19 minutes into a 22-minute speech that former Vice President Al Gore mentioned President Donald Trump ’s name .
